metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8321 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in RubyGems 2.6 and later through 3.0.2. SinceGem::UserInteraction#verbose calls say without escaping, escape sequenceinjection is possible.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.12
ruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.12
ruby2.3-tcltk - 2.3.1-2~16.04.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2~16.04.12').
